server.DataAccessObjs

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.DataAccessObjs.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that makes all transactions so as to avoid duplicate code when calling a transaction on any of the DB
